participant_1.name: Clara
participant_1.personality: Clara is an enthusiastic and energetic individual who loves spending time with her dog and enjoys the thrill of competition. She's laid-back about trends and values practicality over appearance.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i hate the color orange. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i do not care about fashion. i dance on the weekends.

participant_2.name: Ethan
participant_2.personality: Ethan is a curious and imaginative boy who often thinks about the extraordinary. He carries a sense of wonder about his unique abilities and is quite resilient despite his health challenges.
participant_2.background: i'm a boy. i can move objects with my mind. i had to have a transplant. i was born with my heart outside my body.
